theEnforcer:MercurialResolve.NAME: Mercurial Resolve
theEnforcer:MercurialResolve.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block when a card is theenforcer:Flipped.

theEnforcer:FlippantFury.NAME: Flippant Fury
theEnforcer:FlippantFury.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is theenforcer:Flipped, deal !M! damage to all enemies.

theEnforcer:ShieldsUp.NAME: Shields Up!
theEnforcer:ShieldsUp.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your turn.

theEnforcer:ReactiveArmour.NAME: Reactive Armour
theEnforcer:ReactiveArmour.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Block to all enemies, then removes your Block.

theEnforcer:StaggeredDeflection.NAME: Staggered Deflection
theEnforcer:StaggeredDeflection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn. NL theenforcer:Flips.

theEnforcer:TheShield.NAME: The Shield
theEnforcer:TheShield.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! card. NL theenforcer:Flips.

theEnforcer:TheStick.NAME: The Stick
theEnforcer:TheStick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! card. NL theenforcer:Flips.

theEnforcer:TheBoot.NAME: The Boot
theEnforcer:TheBoot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! card. NL theenforcer:Flips.

theEnforcer:ExplodingShield.NAME: Exploding Shield
theEnforcer:ExplodingShield.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal half of your accumulated block as damage to a random enemy.
theEnforcer:ExplodingShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal half of your accumulated block as damage to all enemies.

theEnforcer:FullKit.NAME: The Full Kit
theEnforcer:FullKit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage three times, apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable, and Exhaust !M! cards.

theEnforcer:CutTheChaff.NAME: Cut The Chaff
theEnforcer:CutTheChaff.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Energy, Exhaust your hand. NL theenforcer:Flips.

theEnforcer:RingOut.NAME: Ring Out
theEnforcer:RingOut.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to all enemies. NL Take !D! damage.

theEnforcer:AdrenalineStream.NAME: Adrenaline Stream
theEnforcer:AdrenalineStream.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength when a card is theenforcer:Flipped.

theEnforcer:Jumpy.NAME: Jumpy
theEnforcer:Jumpy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity when a card is theenforcer:Flipped.

theEnforcer:FlashesOut.NAME: Flashes Out!
theEnforcer:FlashesOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies and apply !M! Weak.

theEnforcer:ComeOnThen.NAME: Come On Then!
theEnforcer:ComeOnThen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! Block for every attack you make this turn. NL Gain !M! Strength this turn. NL theenforcer:Flips.

theEnforcer:StayBack.NAME: Stay Back!
theEnforcer:StayBack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Dexterity this turn. NL theenforcer:Flips.

theEnforcer:Entrench.NAME: Entrench
theEnforcer:Entrench.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Energy. NL You cannot attack this turn.

theEnforcer:WeighTheOdds.NAME: Weigh The Odds
theEnforcer:WeighTheOdds.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! Cards. NL Deal !M! Damage whenever a card is theenforcer:Flipped this turn. NL theenforcer:Flips.

theEnforcer:WeighTheOptions.NAME: Weigh The Options
theEnforcer:WeighTheOptions.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. Exhaust !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! Cards. NL theenforcer:Flips.

theEnforcer:Cauterise.NAME: Cauterise
theEnforcer:Cauterise.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! Cards. Add a Burn to your discard pile.

theEnforcer:ExploitWeakness.NAME: Exploit Weakness
theEnforcer:ExploitWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage, if enemy has Weak, deal double damage.

theEnforcer:Shatter.NAME: Shatter
theEnforcer:Shatter.DESCRIPTION: Remove an Enemy's Block. NL theenforcer:Flips.

theEnforcer:CollectScraps.NAME: Collect The Scraps
theEnforcer:CollectScraps.DESCRIPTION: Remove half of an Enemy's Block, gain Block equal to damage dealt. NL theenforcer:Flips.

theEnforcer:Shear.NAME: Shear
theEnforcer:Shear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Remove all Thorns from enemy.

theEnforcer:GoForTheArm.NAME: Go For The Arm!
theEnforcer:GoForTheArm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and Remove !M! Strength from Enemy X Times.

theEnforcer:RegrowthStims.NAME: Regrowth Stims
theEnforcer:RegrowthStims.DESCRIPTION: Lose !D! HP, Gain !M! Regen. NL theenforcer:Flips. NL theenforcer:Stimulant.

theEnforcer:CombatStims.NAME: Combat Stims
theEnforcer:CombatStims.DESCRIPTION: Lose !D! HP, Gain !M! Combat Stimulants. NL theenforcer:Flips. NL theenforcer:Stimulant.

theEnforcer:MutagenicCocktail.NAME: Mutagenic Cocktail
theEnforcer:MutagenicCocktail.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity this turn, gain !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! Poison. NL theenforcer:Stimulant. NL Exhaust.
theEnforcer:MutagenicCocktail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity this turn, gain !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! Poison.

theEnforcer:IntellectualInhaler.NAME: Intellectual Inhaler
theEnforcer:IntellectualInhaler.DESCRIPTION: Draw and Exhaust up to !M! cards. Gain !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! Poison. NL theenforcer:Stimulant. NL Exhaust.

theEnforcer:Juiced.NAME: JUICED!
theEnforcer:Juiced.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP, Gain [E] [E] and draw 3 cards. NL Remove Stimmed. NL theenforcer:Flips.
theEnforcer:Juiced.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP, Gain [E] [E] [E] and draw 3 cards. NL Remove theenforcer:Stimmed. NL theenforcer:Flips. NL Lose Less HP if theenforcer:Stimmed.

theEnforcer:RoidRage.NAME: Roid Rage
theEnforcer:RoidRage.DESCRIPTION: Lose !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! HP, Gain !M! Strength, and deal !D! Damage !M! times. NL Remove theenforcer:Stimmed. NL theenforcer:Flips. NL Increases effects if theenforcer:Stimmed.

theEnforcer:VolatileSerum.NAME: Volatile Serum
theEnforcer:VolatileSerum.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP, at the end of your turn, lose !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! HP and deal !M! Damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust. NL theenforcer:Stimulant.
theEnforcer:VolatileSerum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP, at the end of tour turn, deal !M! Damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust. NL theenforcer:Stimulant.

theEnforcer:InertSolution.NAME: Inert Solution
theEnforcer:InertSolution.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the negative effects of your next theenforcer:Stimulant. NL Exhaust.
theEnforcer:InertSolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the negative effects of your next theenforcer:Stimulant. NL Remove theenforcer:Stimmed. NL Exhaust.

theEnforcer:UltraMegaRoids.NAME: Ultra Mega 'Roids
theEnforcer:UltraMegaRoids.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] , Draw !M! cards, Exhaust !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! cards, and gain 8 Strength. NL Die next turn.

theEnforcer:HypodermicStrike.NAME: Hypodermic Strike
theEnforcer:HypodermicStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theenforcer:Extract unblocked damage. NL theenforcer:Flips.

theEnforcer:HypodermicSiphon.NAME: Hypodermic Siphon
theEnforcer:HypodermicSiphon.DESCRIPTION: Convert all of your stacks of Hypodermic Extract into HP. NL theenforcer:Flips.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have no extract to siphon...

theEnforcer:VitriolicDecay.NAME: Vitriolic Decay
theEnforcer:VitriolicDecay.DESCRIPTION: When the targeted enemy dies, apply their Maximum HP as damage to all enemies.

theEnforcer:Hurricanrana.NAME: Hurricanrana
theEnforcer:Hurricanrana.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If target has Weak, gain [E] and draw !M! card.

theEnforcer:BreathingRoom.NAME: Breathing Room
theEnforcer:BreathingRoom.DESCRIPTION: When Weak is applied to an enemy, draw !M! card.
theEnforcer:BreathingRoom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When Weak is applied to an enemy, draw !M! cards.

theEnforcer:UnendingSalvo.NAME: Unending Salvo
theEnforcer:UnendingSalvo.DESCRIPTION: Apply !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to all enemies X times.

theEnforcer:Parry.NAME: Parry
theEnforcer:Parry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. If targeted enemy is attacking, deal !D! damage.

theEnforcer:ChemBurn.NAME: Chem Burn
theEnforcer:ChemBurn.DESCRIPTION: Lose [E] when drawn, Gain [E] [E] when Exhausted.

theEnforcer:LingeringToxin.NAME: Lingering Toxin
theEnforcer:LingeringToxin.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, add a Chem Burn to your hand.

theEnforcer:HardeningFormula.NAME: Hardening Formula
theEnforcer:HardeningFormula.DESCRIPTION: Lose !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! HP and Gain !M! Metallicize. NL theenforcer:Flips. NL theenforcer:Stimulant.

theEnforcer:TemperingFlask.NAME: Tempering Flask
theEnforcer:TemperingFlask.DESCRIPTION: Lose !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! HP and Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL theenforcer:Flips. NL theenforcer:Stimulant.

theEnforcer:LongTermHealthPlan.NAME: Long Term Health Plan
theEnforcer:LongTermHealthPlan.DESCRIPTION: If you are theenforcer:Stimmed , remove Stimmed at the start of your turn. Gain theenforcer:Prepped at the start of your turn.

theEnforcer:VaporisingShot.NAME: Vaporising Shot
theEnforcer:VaporisingShot.DESCRIPTION: Lose !theEnforcer:SecondMagic! HP and Gain !M! Intangible. NL theenforcer:Stimulant.

theEnforcer:ToxicVent.NAME: Toxic Vent
theEnforcer:ToxicVent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If theenforcer:Stimmed , deal !D! damage to all enemies and remove Stimmed.
